messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
We’re the Karate Quads!I will strike a blow for tears with
my fist! Hiyah, teeeeeeaaaaaaaaars!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I’m so hungry, kid...
I don’t have any strength left...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I lost because I didn’t eat
enough pizza....No. Anything I say will sound
like I’m making excuses.
